meta.description: IT Services/Managed Services company specific customizations

service.name: IT Services & Managed Services

fitAnalysis.message: This is a solid starting point with upside growth potential

whyFeasible: Service companies are great for learning structured engineering practices
Exposure to multiple clients and domains accelerates learning
Strong mentorship and internal training programs available
Clear ladder for growth from developer to architect
whatYouNeed: Deep understanding of client requirements and communication
Ability to work within established processes and frameworks
Knowledge of best practices for large-scale enterprise systems
Future: Build independent thinking and architecture skills to move to product companies

rounds.name: Aptitude & Technical Assessment
points: General problem solving and coding basics
Attention to detail and process following

rounds.name: Technical & HR Interview
points: Willingness to follow processes and grow
